armors.name: Composite Arms Armor
armors.description: Heavy HDP armor with unmatched impact protection and insulation.
armors.flavor: Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure.

armors.name: Composite Chest Armor
armors.description: Heavy HDP armor with unmatched impact protection and insulation.
armors.flavor: Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure.

armors.name: Fur Arms Armor
armors.description: Heavy fur gloves, extremely warm with moderate physical protection.

armors.name: Fur Chest Armor
armors.description: An armored fur jacket, giving warmth and reasonable damage protection.

armors.name: Fur Feet Armor
armors.description: Heavily insulated fur boots, offering moderate physical protection.

armors.name: Fur Head Armor
armors.description: Heavy, warm and moderately protective headgear.

armors.name: Fur Legs Armor
armors.description: Heavy, strengthened fur leg armor, warm and moderately protective.

armors.name: Ghillie Arms Armor
armors.description: Lightweight camouflage, reduces visibility to wildlife, but gives little protection or warmth.
armors.flavor: Take the effort out of hunting.

armors.description: Lightweight camouflage, reduces visibility to wildlife, but gives little protection or warmth.

armors.name: Leather Arms Armor
armors.description: Gauntlets, providing basic protection and insulation.

armors.name: Leather Chest Armor
armors.description: A basic cuirass, gives limited insulation and damage protection.

armors.name: Leather Feet Armor
armors.description: Roughly made boots, increase temperature and damage resistance.

armors.name: Leather Head Armor
armors.description: Headgear, providing some insulation and damage protection.

armors.name: Leather Legs Armor
armors.description: Simple chausses, improving insulation and damage resistance.

armors.name: Polar Bear Arms Armor
armors.description: Tough and lightweight fur gloves offering extreme protection against low temperatures.
armors.flavor: Skinning polar bears has been illegal to everyone except Inuit hunters for centuries on Earth. On Icarus, there is no such prohibition.

armors.name: Polar Bear Chest Armor
armors.description: Strong, lightweight body armor with extreme protection against cold.
armors.flavor: Evolved for the most demanding climate on Earth, the polar bear's skin works equally well in the most damaged environment on Icarus.

armors.name: Polar Bear Feet Armor
armors.description: Highly insulated, lightweight protective fur boots.
armors.flavor: Evolved for the most demanding climate on Earth, the polar bear's skin works equally well in the most damaged environment on Icarus.

armors.name: Polar Bear Head Armor
armors.description: Lightweight, highly insulated head protection.
armors.flavor: Once a warm high altitude desert, the arctic's temperature dropped in the aftermath of faile terraforming, leaving a frigid wasteland of which the polar bear is now the unchallenged apex predator.

armors.name: Polar Bear Legs Armor
armors.description: Lightweight fur armor for the lower body, offering exceptional insulation.
armors.flavor: Once a warm high altitude desert, the arctic's temperature dropped in the aftermath of faile terraforming, leaving a frigid wasteland of which the polar bear is now the unchallenged apex predator.

workshop.name: CX-400 Arms Armor
workshop.description: The latest technology, designed to assist with mining and felling.
workshop.flavor: You'll find you can lift more with this set.

workshop.name: CX-400 Chest Armor
workshop.description: The latest technology, designed to assist with mining and felling.

workshop.name: CX-400 Feet Armor
workshop.description: The latest technology, designed to assist with mining and felling.
workshop.flavor: The toughest boots on the orbital market.

workshop.name: CX-400 Head Armor
workshop.description: The latest technology, designed to assist with mining and felling.
workshop.flavor: The perfect companion for any aspiring miner or lumberjack.

workshop.name: CX-400 Legs Armor
workshop.description: The latest technology, designed to assist with mining and felling.
workshop.flavor: Never skip leg day, unless you have these to help.

workshop.name: Naneo Arms Armor
workshop.description: High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.

workshop.name: Naneo Chest Armor
workshop.description: High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.

workshop.name: Naneo Feet Armor
workshop.description: High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.

workshop.name: Naneo Head Armor
workshop.description: High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.
workshop.flavor: A high-tech balance of physical protection, lightwieght nano-construction, energy absorbance and protection against extremes of temperature.

workshop.name: Naneo Legs Armor
workshop.description: High strength, lightweight graphene nano-lattice armor from Norex.

workshop.name: ST-700 Arms Armor
workshop.description: A lightweight piece of armor designed with stealth and movement in mind.
workshop.flavor: Please report any unusal side effects to your local UDA office.

workshop.name: ST-700 Chest Armor
workshop.description: A lightweight piece of armor designed with stealth and movement in mind.
workshop.flavor: Disclaimer: Processed in a factory that also handles radioactive material.

workshop.name: ST-700 Feet Armor
workshop.description: A lightweight piece of armor designed with stealth and movement in mind.
workshop.flavor: Some users may notice a mild tingling sensation when wearing these boots for an extended period.

workshop.name: ST-700 Head Armor
workshop.description: A lightweight piece of armor designed with stealth and movement in mind.
workshop.flavor: One of the many triumphs of human engineering.

workshop.name: ST-700 Head Armor
workshop.description: A lightweight piece of armor designed with stealth and movement in mind.
workshop.flavor: These armor pieces are made of the latest [REDACTED] materials.
